reporting_cycle: The Panel of Experts shall provide a midterm report by 12 November 2011 and a final report thirty days prior to the termination of its mandate
summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling previous relevant resolutions and statements on the proliferation of nuclear, chemical, and biological weapons,
Decides to extend the mandate of the Panel of Experts, established to monitor sanctions on the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, until 12 June 2012.
Requests the Panel to provide a midterm report by 12 December 2011 and a final report 30 days prior to the termination of its mandate.
Requests the Panel to provide a planned program of work within 30 days of appointment and to update the Committee as necessary.
Urges all States and relevant UN bodies to cooperate fully with the Committee and the Panel of Experts.
Determines that the proliferation of nuclear, chemical, and biological weapons continues to threaten international peace and security.
Acting under Article 41 of Chapter VII, 
Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
